name: Blue Blood (Pitarcus)
description:
This game started as a project for Game Engines subject at Universitat Jaume I. Since I was really excited I've been working to complete a short experience that is meaningful, so I hope you enjoy this journey!

All modelling, animation, sound design, game design and development was done solo, so any suggestion, tips or feedback of any time is really appreciated<3.

Some tips...
  • When dying food will appear in a bag. It does not disappear when dying again, so feel free to die as many times as you want to bring the food back!
  • If you get stuck at any time, use the in game menu to respawn.
  • There is no obligation to get all collectables, the cubs are NOT REAL. They will die if you do not get enough to feed them, but you can try again later!
